title: Hour 3 - Marconi Award Winner, Joe Dumars
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Marconi Award Winner, Joe Dumars
description:
Dan tries to be humble as he talks about winning yet another Marconi award. And he talks to former NBA legend Joe Dumars about the current state of the NBA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
